message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I know you'll love. I'm asking for $115 for it. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can't afford $115 at the moment. Would you consider lowering the price to $100?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I'm happy to negotiate, $100 just doesn't cover my costs. I'm willing to come down to $105. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Unfortunately, $105 is still beyond my budget. Could you consider $98 as a fair offer?
